metadata.title: Partner with Mythoria
metadata.description: Join Mythoria as a printing partner, attraction venue, or retail brand. Grow your business by connecting with thousands of creative families. Apply now to become a trusted partner.
metadata.ogTitle: Partner with Mythoria - Grow Your Business
metadata.ogDescription: Connect with thousands of creative families. Become a Mythoria printing partner, attraction venue, or retail brand partner. Apply now.
metadata.twitterTitle: Partner with Mythoria - Grow Your Business
metadata.twitterDescription: Join our partnership program and connect with thousands of creative families seeking unique storytelling experiences.

hero.title: Grow Your Business with Mythoria.
hero.subtitle: We introduce you to thousands of creative families. You get new, loyal customers.
hero.tagline: It's the perfect next chapter for your business.

partnershipTypes.title: A Partnership That Fits Your Business.
partnershipTypes.subtitle: Whether you're a local print shop or a national attraction, we have a way to grow together.

printing.title: For Printing Services
printing.description: Become a go-to local printer for Mythoria families. We send you a steady stream of print-on-demand orders, complete with print-ready files. You just handle the magic of turning our digital stories into real-world treasures.

attractions.title: For Attractions & Venues
attractions.description: Turn your park, zoo, or aquarium into the setting for a unique adventure. Offer a perfect souvenir that drives ticket sales and gives families a magical way to remember their visit, long after they've gone home.

retailers.title: For Retailers & Brands
retailers.description: Offer your customers a unique co-branded experience. Let's create a custom version of Mythoria, or make your stores the exclusive, trusted spot for families to pick up their one-of-a-kind books.

step1.title: Tell Us Your Story
step1.description: Fill out the simple form below to introduce your business and what you do.

step2.title: We'll Map Our Quest
step2.description: Our team will review your application and contact you to chat about a perfect fit.

step3.title: Start the Adventure
step3.description: Once approved, we'll onboard you and start sending new customers your way.

accessFamilies.title: Access to Thousands of Families
accessFamilies.description: Tap into our growing community of creative, engaged families looking for unique experiences.

seamlessIntegration.title: Seamless Integration
seamlessIntegration.description: We handle the tech, marketing, and customer acquisition. You focus on what you do best.

recurringRevenue.title: Recurring Revenue
recurringRevenue.description: Build a steady stream of business through our subscription model and loyal customer base.

brandAssociation.title: Brand Association
brandAssociation.description: Align your business with a trusted, innovative brand that families love.

form.title: Ready to Join the Story?
form.subtitle: Let's start the conversation. Fill out the form and our partnership team will get in touch.
